short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert your text into any number of cases (Capitalize, lowercase, etc). Right-click on any editable text box on a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickCase is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to help you quickly change the case of any text in your browser. It allows you to easily convert text to uppercase, lowercase, sentence case, title case, and even toggle case.

You no longer have to manually retype or copy-paste text to change its case. Whether you're working on an important document, sending an email, or browsing the web, QuickCase makes it easy to transform your text with just a few clicks.
